uploadMeme.title: Upload a Meme
uploadMeme.name: Name
uploadMeme.name-placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for your meme
uploadMeme.tags-note: Include as many tags as you can (such as movie/show name, actor/actress relevant text etc.) to simplify searching for that meme
uploadMeme.image-url-placeholder: Image Link from social media like X, fb, etc
uploadMeme.image-url-note: Only a small subset of urls is allowed so if that fails try downloading the image and uploading the file
uploadMeme.upload-error-description: This is can be either due to image size (>2MB) or the provided url is not allowed. Try downloading the image and uploading the file

memeGenerator.title: Meme Generator - Create Memes Online for Free
memeGenerator.subtitle: Looking for a quick and easy way to create memes? With our Meme Generator, you can upload any image, add your own text, and download your custom meme in just a few clicks. Whether it’s a joke for your friends or a viral post for social media, this tool makes it simple and fun.
memeGenerator.instructions-title: How to Use the Meme Generator
memeGenerator.step-1: Upload Your Image: Click the "Choose File" button to upload your photo or image.
memeGenerator.step-2: Add Your Text: Use the "Add Text Box" option to write captions. You can move the text, resize it, or change its color to fit your style.
memeGenerator.step-3: Download Your Meme: Once you’re happy with the result, hit "Download" and save your meme instantly.
